title: A Case for Time Tracking: Data Driven Time-Management
A Filesystem on Noms
description: Since Noms dropped last week the dev community has seemed into it. “Git for data” — it simultaneously evokes something very familiar and yet unconstrained. Something that hasn’t been well-noted is how much care the team has taken to make Noms fun to build with, and it is. Noms is a content-addressable, decentralized, append-only database. It borrows [...]
